content: to think Being explicitly: relinquish Being as ground of beings [beyond ground?] in favor of giving which prevails concealed in unconcealment, in favor of the Es Gibt

motif.name: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY
motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

linkedContent: to think Being explicitly: relinquish Being as ground of beings [beyond ground?] in favor of giving which prevails concealed in unconcealment, in favor of the Es Gibt

content: [Augustine] beginning of Western thinking, Being is thought, not as “It gives” as such, latter withdraws in favor of gift which it gives > giving which gives only its gift, in giving holds itself back and withdraws, such a giving we call sending [lookup] > Being—that which It gives—is what is sent [other names for Being]

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

linkedContent: [Augustine] beginning of Western thinking, Being is thought, not as “It gives” as such, latter withdraws in favor of gift which it gives > giving which gives only its gift, in giving holds itself back and withdraws, such a giving we call sending [lookup] > Being—that which It gives—is what is sent [other names for Being]

content: [the sending & what is sent] history of Being, destiny of Being, the sending & It which sends forth hold back w/ their self-manifestation, hold back as epoche, thus we can speak of epochs of destiny of Being > [method] gradual removal of these obscuring covers [epochs]
linkedContent: [the sending & what is sent] history of Being, destiny of Being, the sending & It which sends forth hold back w/ their self-manifestation, hold back as epoche, thus we can speak of epochs of destiny of Being > [method] gradual removal of these obscuring covers [epochs]

content: our task: trace Being to its own from Appropriation (w/out regard to relation of Being to beings) [beyond ontological difference? beyond metaphysics?], think Being w/ out regard to metaphysics > but regard for metaphysics still prevails, thus our task is to cease all overcoming [of metaphysics], leave metaphysics to itself

content: saying of Appropriation in form of a lecture remains itself an obstacle of this kind [metaphysical obstacles that render such saying inadequate] > lecture has spoke merely in propositional statements
